PERSONA:
frank is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has never lived outside of the u.s. frank completed high school but did not pursue further education. 

although he does not identify with any particular religion, frank considers himself unaffiliated and seldom attends religious services. politically, he leans towards the republican party and holds conservative views. frank comes from a middle-income household, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 per year.

despite his age, frank is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously. in his free time, frank enjoys volunteering and giving back to his community. overall, frank is a down-to-earth, traditional american man who values his family, his country, and his way of life.
